name: Mohd Amaan

positions.subtitle: National Service Scheme, DTU
positions.description: NSS DTU has a volunteer base of around 250 students belonging to various disciplines of engineering at DTU. We work on a diverse range of social and environmental issues viz. literacy and health awareness. The overall aim of NSS-DTU is to give an extended dimension to the higher education system and orient the students towards community service while they are studying in the institution, more precisely, to establish a meaningful linkage between the campus and the community so that their interaction with the common villagers and slum dwellers will expose the students to the harsh realities of poverty-stricken life and bring about a change in their social perception.
positions.title: General Secretary
positions.description_html: NSS DTU has a volunteer base of around 250 students belonging to various disciplines of engineering at DTU. We work on a diverse range of social and environmental issues viz. literacy and health awareness. The overall aim of NSS-DTU is to give an extended dimension to the higher education system and orient the students towards community service while they are studying in the institution, more precisely, to establish a meaningful linkage between the campus and the community so that their interaction with the common villagers and slum dwellers will expose the students to the harsh realities of poverty-stricken life and bring about a change in their social perception.

positions.subtitle: INNOVA DTU
positions.description: INNOVA is a Techno-Management fest of Delhi Technological University (Formerly DCE). It is a 3 day long event which happens in the month of February every year. Founded in 1994, under the Department of Mechanical and Civil Engineering as a celebration of talent and creativity. Over the past 22 years, INNOVA has been a symposium of young minds from numerous colleges across the nation to participate in innovative events and inculcate new technicalities.

recommendations: Yashica Tuli ‚ÄúI have come across a lot of interns, but Amaan was a unique one to work. Amaan is amongst one of those who are always one step ahead of learning and upskilling themselves. With freshness and intelligence, he can contribute a lot to any project with complete diligence. I must say I have learned a lot from him during his internship period and I wish him all the best for all his future endeavors.‚Äù

Naina Kapoor ‚ÄúAmaan is constantly eager to take on new challenges and demonstrates devotion by completing duties on time and exhibiting all the expected traits. His dedication and efficiency are admirable. He has demonstrated his analytical abilities to diagnose problems and find feasible solutions in a variety of situations. Simple words would do injustice to his abilities, and to sum it all up, he is and would be an asset to any organisation.‚Äù
